extendedInfo.description: Crazy Eights a Classic card game great fun for all the familyby far the best version on the market ...Enjoy!!!... this Game represents 100s of hours of my work.Constructive suggestions,are very much appreciated.abusive muk Will be reported to Google

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Terrible..doesn\'t follow it\'s own rules...even made me pick up the 5 cards after I played the queen of spades
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I can\'t even give it a star it doesn\'t deserve a stare because I go and put an 8 down and I pick a suit then the stuped game picks its own suit uninstall.\tDON\'T GET THIS GAME PLEASE UNINSTALL IF YOU GET IT, IT CHEATS WHEN YOU LAY AN 8 IT PICKS IT OWN SUIT.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Eat COCK green thingy! I am the LOCO OCHO champ.

reviews.comment: Most horrid game on earth! Stupid interface, stupid actions works half the time. Horrid!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: If i could put negative stars i would! It gives me cards and it tellS me its my turn so i pic From the pile and it takes my turn away! LAME!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Asked me to put down the wrong suit of cards...unistalled

reviews.comment: Nice game. I play this on facebook on the computer with a timer. Please make the apps like facebook.

reviews.comment: Needs volume controll. Good game though. HTC hero.

reviews.comment: Not like any crazy eight I ever played. U cannot draw a card while computer throws many. U cannot draw a card. Game sucks.

reviews.comment: This gamecheats it will make more moves then u it also changes up suits in the middle of playing needs to be fixed asap overall it would be a goodgame

reviews.comment: Crap. You shouldn\'t be allowed to put this crap on the market if it doesn\'t even work. Crashed after 2 hands...sucked anyway.

reviews.comment: Can never get past level 5 always freezes up!!! Please fix!!

reviews.comment: cheats sometimes and force closes, freezes. other than that fun! fix please.

reviews.comment: Game is fun and addictive,but it has some issues to work out. Like having high score,not closing after the 4level,control for sound.
